title: 谁能帮我写一段命令方块代码？关于原版NPC
author: 晓阳
txt_content:
我在制作解密地图，剧情需要一个妹子，我觉得村民不行，女巫更不行，看见帕西红石中阶教学有一集里面他做了个NPC，是他自己
所以，请红石大触帮忙写一段代码，召唤一个妹子NPC，别告诉我不行

replies.txt_content: 只是生成？不需要其他功能？ 使用如下指令：/summon ArmorStand ~ ~1 ~ {Equipment:[{},{id:"minecraft:leather_boots",Damage:0s,Count:1b,tag:{display:{color:0},Unbreakable:1b}},{id:"minecraft:leather_leggings",Damage:0s,Count:1b,tag:{display:{color:0},Unbreakable:1b}},{id:"minecraft:leather_chestplate",Damage:0s,Count:1b,tag:{display:{color:0},Unbreakable:1b}},{id:"minecraft:skull",Count:1b,Damage:3s,tag:{SkullOwner:"名字"}}],Invisible:1b,Pose:{Body:[0.0F,0.0F,0.0F],LeftArm:[0.0F,0.0F,0.0F],RightArm:[0.0F,0.0F,0.0F],LeftLeg:[0.0F,0.0F,0.0F],RightLeg:[0.0F,0.0F,0.0F],Head:[0.0F,0.0F,0.0F]}}在名字处填写需要的ID即可，比如填写Docm77就能生成一个头戴Docm77头颅的盔甲架。

replies.author: 晓阳
replies.txt_content:
